scripts.dev:win: npm run sync-version && cargo tauri dev --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.dev:mac: npm run sync-version && cargo tauri dev --target aarch64-apple-darwin
scripts.dev:mac-intel: npm run sync-version && cargo tauri dev --target x86_64-apple-darwin
scripts.build:win: npm run sync-version && cargo tauri build --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.build:mac: npm run sync-version && cargo tauri build --target aarch64-apple-darwin
scripts.build:mac-intel: npm run sync-version && cargo tauri build --target x86_64-apple-darwin
